Name: Show rulers on hover
Description: Can I enable vertical and horizontal rulers on the page when I hover on the elements?
Author: @pankajparashar
@kilianvalkhof

Chrome.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`Shift+?` or `F1`) > **Preferences** > Scroll down to the **Elements** section, and enable "Show rulers on hover".

Firefox.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`F1`) > Scroll down to the **Available Toolbox Buttons** section, and enable "Toggle rulers for the page"

Edge.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`Shift+?` or `F1`) > **Preferences** > Scroll down to the **Elements** section, and enable "Show rulers on hover".

Safari.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`Cmd+,`) > Elements > Enable "Show page rulers and node border lines"

Opera.Notes: 1. Open Settings (`Shift+?` or `F1`) > Preferences > Scroll down to the Elements section, and enable "Show rulers on hover".

Polypane.Notes: 1. Press `Cmd/Ctrl+G` to toggle rulers on the top and left sides of all panes.
